channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Courses LMS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Courses LMS

item.title: CVE-2021-24621|2024-08-03T19:35:20.357Z -- unknown -- wp%20courses%20lms
item.description: The WP Courses LMS WordPress plugin before 2.0.44 does not sanitise its Video Embed Code, allowing malicious code to be injected in it by high privilege users, even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed, which could lead to Stored Cross-Site Scripting issues
